summary: *Does not contain flames!* An orange-ish re-color of the Daedric Sword.
descriptionHtml:
**this will replace the Daedric dagger as well because they share the same texture file in the game**

Mod Manager friendly!

I decided to do a weapon that matched well with my Flame Orange Daedric Armor re-color, located here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1159

If the demand is right, I may do the other weapons and shield as well.

I tried to not go over-the-top with the parts that were orange so I left the blade untouched minus some overall color adjustments.
author: Katalyst
